body:
Is there any reason this couldn't just be

```js
return JSON.stringify(base) === JSON.stringify(fork);
```

I'd expect that to act the same as the hash version, and also be faster.
body_html:
Is there any reason this couldn't just be

return JSON.stringify(base) === JSON.stringify(fork);

I'd expect that to act the same as the hash version, and also be faster.
